# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its exceptional features and capabilities, it's truly a game-changer in its field. I believe you'll find immense value in it. Considering its quality and benefits, I'm extending this exclusive offer to you for $180. Let me know if you have any questions or need more information about how this product can enhance your experience. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $180. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $180
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
